Package groupthree

Class FarkleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • farkleapp.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FarkleInterface

    public class FarkleController
extends java.lang.Object
implements FarkleInterface
    This is the controller class for Farkle. It is the class that interfaces between the FXML files generated by Scene Builder and the local variables and objects in Java via the @FXML annotation.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FarkleController​()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void bankPointsButtonPushed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method runs when the "Bank Points" button has been clicked.
      void enterGameScreenButtonPushed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When this method is called, it will change the Scene to GameScreen.
      void exitHandler​()
      When this method is called, it will exit the application.
      java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> getRectangles​()
      This method is to return our ArrayList of rList for use by other classes.
      void holdRectangles​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method will call methods from our game instance of DiceUILogic to take our rList and add a glow, then hold the corresponding dice.
      void rollTheDiceButtonPushed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles the ActionEvent generated by pressing the "Roll Dice" button within the application.
      void setRectangleArray​()
      This method simply adds our rList into the rectangle ArrayList.

      • rollTheDiceButtonPushed

        public void rollTheDiceButtonPushed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the ActionEvent generated by pressing the "Roll Dice" button within the application. It animates the current rList on the screen as well as utilizes the Dice class and initializes a random number onto each one.
        Specified by:
        rollTheDiceButtonPushed in interface FarkleInterface
        Parameters:
        event - is the ActionEvent generated by pressing the Roll Dice button.

      • bankPointsButtonPushed

        public void bankPointsButtonPushed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method runs when the "Bank Points" button has been clicked.
        Specified by:
        bankPointsButtonPushed in interface FarkleInterface
        Parameters:
        event - MouseEvent that this method takes as the input.

      • holdRectangles

        public void holdRectangles​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        This method will call methods from our game instance of DiceUILogic to take our rList and add a glow, then hold the corresponding dice.
        Specified by:
        holdRectangles in interface FarkleInterface
        Parameters:
        event - The Mouse2Event generated by clicking a rectangle.

      • getRectangles

        public java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> getRectangles​()
        This method is to return our ArrayList of rList for use by other classes.
